title: Rustdoc 'rustc' panicked at 'no resolutions for a doc link', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/encoder.rs:2228:18
body:
I tried this code: ``` git clone https://github.com/xfbs/oso git checkout bug cd oso/languages/rust/oso cargo doc --all-features ``` I expected to see this happen: get some docs Instead, this happened: it crashes ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.69.0 (84c898d65 2023-04-16) binary: rustc commit-hash: 84c898d65adf2f39a5a98507f1fe0ce10a2b8dbc commit-date: 2023-04-16 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.69.0 LLVM version: 15.0.7 ```
Backtrace

``` patrick@Titus:~/Projects/tmp/oso/languages/rust/oso$ cargo doc --all-features Documenting rustix v0.35.13 Checking polar-core v0.27.0 (/home/patrick/Projects/tmp/oso/polar-core) Documenting polar-core v0.27.0 (/home/patrick/Projects/tmp/oso/polar-core) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no resolutions for a doc link', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/encoder.rs:2228:18 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7fa10e16731a - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::ha9053a9a07ca49cb at /rustc/84c898d65adf2f39a5a98507f1fe0ce10a2b8dbc/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7fa10e16731a - __GI___clone3 at ./misc/../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone3.S:81 44: 0x0 - error: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.69.0 (84c898d65 2023-04-16) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [doc_link_resolutions] resolutions for documentation links for a module end of query stack error: could not document `rustix` Caused by: process didn't exit successfully: `rustdoc --edition=2018 --crate-type lib --crate-name rustix /home/patrick/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/rustix-0.35.13/src/lib.rs --cap-lints allow -o /home/patrick/Projects/tmp/oso/target/doc --cfg 'feature="default"' --cfg 'feature="fs"' --cfg 'feature="io-lifetimes"' --cfg 'feature="libc"' --cfg 'feature="std"' --cfg 'feature="use-libc-auxv"' --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi,artifacts,future-incompat --diagnostic-width=254 -C m etadata=4751eee0f0b54a0d -L dependency=/home/patrick/Projects/tmp/oso/target/debug/deps --extern bitflags=/home/patrick/Projects/tmp/oso/target/debug/deps/libbitflags-1a1c34f79f6e612c.rmeta --extern io_lifetimes=/home/patrick/Projects/tmp/oso/target/debu g/deps/libio_lifetimes-be86706b44beb462.rmeta --extern libc=/home/patrick/Projects/tmp/oso/target/debug/deps/liblibc-6934e321af5b0d4a.rmeta --extern linux_raw_sys=/home/patrick/Projects/tmp/oso/target/debug/deps/liblinux_raw_sys-ebf0d114ca5d73f6.rmeta -- crate-version 0.35.13 --cfg linux_raw --cfg asm` (exit status: 101) ```
